definition: thigh/part of a whole/portion of a sum/(stock) share/strand of a thread/low-level administrative unit, translated as "section" or "department" etc, ranked below 科[ke1]/classifier for long winding things like ropes, rivers etc/classifier for smoke, smells etc: thread, puff, whiff/classifier for bands of people, gangs etc/classifier for sudden forceful actions
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

sentences.english: Private-equity firms are the new kings of capitalism.
sentences.chinese: 私募股本公司是资本主义的新主子。

sentences.english: F10 equity intelligent update the information.
In the United States, it is also sometimes possible to declare the equity loan interest as tax deductible.
sentences.chinese: 在美国，它有时也可能宣布股本贷款利息的扣税。

sentences.english: A stock dividend is a prorata distribution of additional shares of a corporation's stock to the stockholders.
sentences.chinese: 红股是按照比例分配给持股人的公司股本的追加股份。

sentences.english: Amount of shares issued by a share-holding enterprise shall be accounted for as equity at the face value of the shares issued.
sentences.chinese: 股份制企业发行股票，应当按股票面值作为股本入帐。

sentences.english: With such high stakes involved, it is no wonder that markets are on their toes.
sentences.chinese: 有这么多股本涉入其中，也难怪市场哀鸿遍野。

sentences.english: One of the best is the equity loan tax deduction.
sentences.chinese: 一个最好的是股本贷款扣税。

sentences.english: On average the companies on our list have a 13% debt-to-equity ratio.
sentences.chinese: 今年上榜企业的债务股本比率平均为13%。

sentences.english: These distributions allow the LPs to invest in new private-equity funds.
sentences.chinese: 这些分配使有限责任合伙人投资新的私人股本基金。

sentences.english: So-called other-than-temporary losses from market-related movements wouldn't need to be deducted from capital.
sentences.chinese: 市场波动造成的所谓的非临时亏损需要从股本中减去。

sentences.english: The stock dividends and the capital in cash extension increases the capital stock form existence obvious vicariousness.
sentences.chinese: 股票股利与资本金转增股本形式存在明显的替代性。

definition: thigh/part of a whole/portion of a sum/(stock) share/strand of a thread/low-level administrative unit, translated as "section" or "department" etc, ranked below 科[ke1]/classifier for long winding things like ropes, rivers etc/classifier for smoke, smells etc: thread, puff, whiff/classifier for bands of people, gangs etc/classifier for sudden forceful actions
